description:
Landon had never flown before. I went to pick him up at baggage claim, but he hadn't arrived yet. A few minutes later, people started filtering in through the corner entrance. I kept my eyes peeled...
About half way through the influx, I spotted this beautiful young man. It was one of those "yes!" moments because I knew it was him. He was wearing a tight t-shirt and his knapsack pulled it back enough that you could see his well-developed chest and abs. In addition, he was wearing a tight pair of jeans with a big bulge in the front.
Even though he had just gotten off a long flight, he had a huge smile on his face. I went over and introduced myself, and he was extremely friendly. I could tell that he was just soaking up every moment of his new adventure!
As for me... I couldn't wait to see him naked!
Once we got him in front of the camera, we asked him a few questions to find out more about him. A few tidbits:
"I'm in school and I bartend," he said. "I'd like to be an entertainer... music entertainment, to be more specific. Music has always been my passion."
Also, he's newly single:
"I just broke up with my girlfriend, so the bluesy, jazzy type music is where I'm at."
And then, the moment of truth!
He took his clothes off and it did not disappoint!
Landon has a big, beefy chest, popping six pack abs, beautiful arms, and a big, thick, powerful cock.
And he likes to show it all off!!
title: Landon
